document_data.name: Phandymm
document_data.mainbody: '''Phandymm''' was a member of [[Zhentil Keep]]'s Council of Lords in [[1368 DR]] and secretly a cleric of [[Bane]].
document_data.History:
Phandymm was a cleric of Bane loyal to the [[High Imperceptor]] of Bane until he met [[Fzoul Chembryl]]; Fzoul gained Phandymm's loyalty and used him as spy in the Orthodox faction of the [[Church of Bane]] and also thank to him in [[1263 DR]] Fzoul gained control over all the Zhentil Banites.
For recompense Fzoul appointed him in the Council but keep his cleric's role secret ([[Manshoon]] however had suspects about). Phandymm always supported Fzoul in Council.

Phandymm's estate was located in the north section of Zhentil Keep's [[Zhentil Keep/Inner Quarter|Inner Quarter]] on the [[Street of the Gods]].
